content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No new structures have been successfully placed on the map. The agent made multiple attempts to create a Lab at position (0.5, 2.5) for supplying Automation Science Packs for research, but all such attempts failed. Although furnaces were referenced during smelting operations, no structure was newly created by the agent.

ERROR TIPS
• Incorrect API usage for get_entities:
  – Avoid passing unexpected keyword arguments (such as “radius”) or extra positional arguments. Always verify the correct function signature before calling.
• Unchecked iteration over a None value:
  – Ensure that the result from get_entities is verified (or defaulted to an empty list) before attempting to iterate over it.
• Lab placement failures due to unavailable inventory:
  – Confirm that the Lab is present in the inventory prior to attempting placement at a designated coordinate.
• Incomplete resource chain for Lab crafting:
  – Pre-check and secure all necessary intermediate components (for example, iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables) so that crafting a Lab can succeed without missing ingredients.
